name: hello-perl
description: A Simple Echo Server built with Net::Server

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib
scripts.start: eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib) && cpanm -vn . ; perl simple_echo_server.pl || node server.js ;
